<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 330 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=71), [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=38), [Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=12), [Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 magic item
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Crackling energy disjoins the target. You attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it. If you succeed, it's deactivated for 1 week. On a critical success, it's destroyed. If it's an [artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=253) or similar item, you automatically fail.
name: Disjunction
